description.en: Jira Software is built for every member of your software team to plan, track, and release great software. WARN: For now, only projects hosted on atlassian domains are supported.
description.it: Jira Software è creato apposta per ogni membro del tuo team di sviluppo software, per pianificare, tenere traccia e rilasciare software fantastici. WARN: Per il momento, sono supportati solo i progetti hostati sui domini atlassian.
description.ga_IE: Tógtar bogearraí Jira do gach ball de do fhoireann bogearraí chun bogearraí iontacha a phleanáil, a rianú agus a scaoileadh.Rabhadh: Faoi láthair, ní thacaítear le tionscadail a óstáiltear ar réimsí Atlassian.
